CustomField.description: Days from Final Reporting Received to Conversion Assets Posted
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL( Conversion_Assets_Posted__c ), TODAY()- Final_Reporting_Received__c , Conversion_Assets_Posted__c - Final_Reporting_Received__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Days from Final Reporting Received to Conversion Assets Posted
CustomField.label: Time to Conversion Assets KPI
